title: Tim Conway in: Dorfromantik
itunes:title: Tim Conway in: Dorfromantik
description:
This week we turn the crank of Panic's Playdate, finish up Norco, try the PC port of Glover on for size, marvel at the idea of a Crazy Taxi SUPER GAME, speculate about a Streets of Rage movie and a third Portal (and the whereabouts of Erik Wolpaw), and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avo
id spoilers. Thanks for listening.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:02:36) A nice hot coffee at the wrestle show
(00:04:44) Show rundown
(00:05:52) The perfect hot chocolate
(00:12:33) The Playdate
(00:38:41) First Break
(00:39:02) Norco [PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac] on Mar 24, 2022
(00:48:00) Dorfromantik [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Mar 25, 2021
(00:54:18) Glover [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Apr 20, 2022
(01:00:25) Horizon Forbidden West [PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4] on Feb 18, 2022
(01:12:20) Second Break
(01:13:06) Sega to reboot Crazy Taxi and Jet Set Radio
(01:19:45) National Labor Board complaint against Nintendo
(01:22:52) Group of shareholders against Activision and Xbox deal
(01:29:37) Hideo Kojima (probably) not joining Sony
(01:36:59) Erik Wolpaw wants to make a new Portal game
(01:44:55) Streets of Rage... THE MOVIE
(01:51:49) Wrapping up and thanks
(01:53:07) Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts
(01:54:56) Nextlander content updates
(01:56:51) See Ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
